name: Slime of Danger: Dani Edition
description:
we made this game as part of a one week game jam, we had 2 days less then others but it didnt stop us from making the game, we started with a slime that have weapons and every more weapon he get the less hp he have. but we didnt have time to finish the game so we made it a big fat meme for dani the amazing creator of karlson and the milk gang creator.

plz take this game as a meme only and have fun!

and Wishlist karlon now gamer
